subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Out of step with the world, the English Premier League is a misnomer. With each passing year, more of its players are hired foreigners, and more than half of its clubs are the property of billionaires from abroad.
snippet: Out of step with the world, the English Premier League is a misnomer. With each passing year, more of its players are hired foreigners, and more than half of its clubs are the property of billionaires from abroad.
